LEAGUE_OF_LEGENDS_CHAMPIONS.SELECT: SELECT VERSION, LANGUAGE, ID, KEY, NAME, TITLE, BLURB, INFO_ATTACK, INFO_DEFENSE, INFO_MAGIC, INFO_DIFFICULTY, IMAGE_FULL, IMAGE_SPRITE, IMAGE_GROUP, IMAGE_X, IMAGE_Y, IMAGE_W, IMAGE_H, TAGS, PARTYPE, STATS_HP, STATS_HPPERLEVEL, STATS_MP, STATS_MPPERLEVEL, STATS_MOVESPEED, STATS_ARMOR, STATS_ARMORPERLEVEL, STATS_SPELLBLOCK, STATS_SPELLBLOCKPERLEVEL, STATS_ATTACKRANGE, STATS_HPREGEN, STATS_HPREGENPERLEVEL, STATS_MPREGEN, STATS_MPREGENPERLEVEL, STATS_CRIT, STATS_CRITPERLEVEL, STATS_ATTACKDAMAGE, STATS_ATTACKDAMAGEPERLEVEL, STATS_ATTACKSPEEDPERLEVEL, STATS_ATTACKSPEED FROM LEAGUE_OF_LEGENDS_CHAMPIONS WHERE VERSION = :VERSION AND LANGUAGE = :LANGUAGE AND ID = :ID
LEAGUE_OF_LEGENDS_CHAMPIONS.INSERT: INSERT INTO LEAGUE_OF_LEGENDS_CHAMPIONS(VERSION, LANGUAGE, ID, KEY, NAME, TITLE, BLURB, INFO_ATTACK, INFO_DEFENSE, INFO_MAGIC, INFO_DIFFICULTY, IMAGE_FULL, IMAGE_SPRITE, IMAGE_GROUP, IMAGE_X, IMAGE_Y, IMAGE_W, IMAGE_H, TAGS, PARTYPE, STATS_HP, STATS_HPPERLEVEL, STATS_MP, STATS_MPPERLEVEL, STATS_MOVESPEED, STATS_ARMOR, STATS_ARMORPERLEVEL, STATS_SPELLBLOCK, STATS_SPELLBLOCKPERLEVEL, STATS_ATTACKRANGE, STATS_HPREGEN, STATS_HPREGENPERLEVEL, STATS_MPREGEN, STATS_MPREGENPERLEVEL, STATS_CRIT, STATS_CRITPERLEVEL, STATS_ATTACKDAMAGE, STATS_ATTACKDAMAGEPERLEVEL, STATS_ATTACKSPEEDPERLEVEL, STATS_ATTACKSPEED) VALUES (:VERSION, :LANGUAGE, :ID, :KEY, :NAME, :TITLE, :BLURB, :INFO_ATTACK, :INFO_DEFENSE, :INFO_MAGIC, :INFO_DIFFICULTY, :IMAGE_FULL, :IMAGE_SPRITE, :IMAGE_GROUP, :IMAGE_X, :IMAGE_Y, :IMAGE_W, :IMAGE_H, :TAGS, :PARTYPE, :STATS_HP, :STATS_HPPERLEVEL, :STATS_MP, :STATS_MPPERLEVEL, :STATS_MOVESPEED, :STATS_ARMOR, :STATS_ARMORPERLEVEL, :STATS_SPELLBLOCK, :STATS_SPELLBLOCKPERLEVEL, :STATS_ATTACKRANGE, :STATS_HPREGEN, :STATS_HPREGENPERLEVEL, :STATS_MPREGEN, :STATS_MPREGENPERLEVEL, :STATS_CRIT, :STATS_CRITPERLEVEL, :STATS_ATTACKDAMAGE, :STATS_ATTACKDAMAGEPERLEVEL, :STATS_ATTACKSPEEDPERLEVEL, :STATS_ATTACKSPEED)
LEAGUE_OF_LEGENDS_CHAMPIONS.DELETE_LIST: DELETE FROM LEAGUE_OF_LEGENDS_CHAMPIONS WHERE VERSION = :VERSION AND LANGUAGE = :LANGUAGE

LEAGUE_OF_LEGENDS_VERSIONS.SELECT: SELECT SEQ, VERSION FROM LEAGUE_OF_LEGENDS_VERSIONS WHERE VERSION = :VERSION
LEAGUE_OF_LEGENDS_VERSIONS.INSERT: INSERT INTO LEAGUE_OF_LEGENDS_VERSIONS(SEQ, VERSION) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM LEAGUE_OF_LEGENDS_VERSIONS), :VERSION)
